entry.title: About: Website Birthday
entry.content:
Halve is a stylish, two-column jekyll theme.


Honestly, I have never been into web development. I didnâ€™t really know where to start off my journey in this enormously large field if I would ever want to make a simple blog for myself. More than that, I thought that the process would be extremely dull and full of macaroni code. Thanks to my friends, particularly Satoru Sasozaki, I was once again proven wrong:

Making a website is fun, especially when you use a parsing engine like Jekyll.

Writing this post, I reassure myself that trying different things is the only way to know if you like them or not. As the time goes by, I would like to add more interesting features and see how far I can go with it.
But for now, smile! We are LIVE!
